Deathstar Run
Instructions
  • W A S D to move
  • Space to fire Lasers
  • M to fire Photon Torpedo
  • Blow up Tie Fighters until you see the Blue Exhaust Port then hit it with a Photon Torpedo M to blow up the Death Star.
May the force be with you!
